alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley; Santa Clarita Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 21 at 2:08PM PST until February 22 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Santa Clarita Valley and Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 10 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley; Santa Clarita Valley
